Posts.Content: Dear Dr. Lim, I have metastatic breast cancer with bone and liver mets, ER+,PR+, HER2 neg.(1+); Ki67 25-30%.First diagnosed in 2008 - stage 2; 2015- mets to bones started Faslodex and X-giva. 2017- mets to liver - 6 courses of Taxotere followed by 8 months on Xeloda than started Aromasin/Afinitor but liver mets are still active SUV max. 5,7. I am filling very tired on constant chemotherapies. Bone mets are stable. Do you recommend me any local therapy for the liver mets? How I should continue my treatement and what therapy to choose - new chemo, hormone therapy, immune therapy? Please share your opinion. Thank you in advance for your response.
Posts.Title: Ask the Expert: Breast cancer oncologist Dr. Bora Lim returns
